item.title: CFF in the wild - analysing software citation metadata file usage
item.description: CW22 - 2022-04-04 Hack Day Idea proposer Stephan Druskat Hack Day Idea title (provisional) CFF in the wild - analysing software citation metadata file usage Context and/or research domain Software citation affects all domains producing research software. Problem The Citation File Format (CFF) enables authors of research software to provide the citation metadata for their software in a human- and machine-readable way, so that their software can be cited correctly.
